info: The project will enable women’s small businesses and rural small businesses to grow, develop, expand, compete, and play a greater income-generating role in Uzbekistan. Through this financial intermediation loan, participating commercial banks (PCBs) will provide subloans to small businesses. At least 30% of the subloans will be to women’s small businesses and at least 50% will be to small businesses outside the city of Tashkent. The project will be supported by TA to strengthen PCBs’ capacity to provide loans to and improve the entrepreneurial capacities of women’s small businesses and rural small businesses.
name: SMALL BUSINESS AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP DEVELOPMENT PROJECT
